personalInfo.title: Senior Full Stack Developer & Solutions Architect

summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 9+ years of expertise in enterprise software architecture and development. Proven track record of delivering high-performance, scalable solutions in fintech and enterprise systems. Core competencies include:

• Technical Leadership: Led and mentored development teams, driving innovation and best practices
• Back-End Development: Java (Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), RESTful APIs, WebSocket, Enterprise Integration
• Front-End Development: Angular, TypeScript, RxJS, State Management (NGXS/NgRx)
• Computer Science Expertise: Distributed systems, algorithms, and advanced data structures
• Data & Analytics: Machine Learning integration, AI solutions, Data Modeling
• Mobile Development: Native (Android/Kotlin, iOS/Swift) and Cross-platform (Flutter/Dart)
• DevOps & Cloud: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, CI/CD automation, Monitoring
• Database Engineering: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, MySQL, Redis, TimescaleDB

Key Achievements:
• Led innovative solutions for payment processing platform handling $100M+ annual transactions
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to reduce system response time by 45% through microservices implementation
• Improved application performance by 60% through technical optimization and coding best practices
• Led and mentored teams of 8+ developers, achieving 95% sprint completion rate
• Implemented secure payment solutions compliant with PCI-DSS standards

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Lead architect and developer for enterprise payment processing systems and mobile applications, demonstrating technical leadership in scalability, security, and performance optimization. Implemented advanced analytics and monitoring solutions.
achievements: Led back-end architecture for Paycell MPOS system processing $50M+ monthly transactions with 99.99% uptime
Collaborated with teams to design and implement microservices architecture reducing system latency by 45%
Implemented AI-powered fraud detection and analytics system reducing fraud incidents by 70%
Developed comprehensive monitoring and analytics dashboard for real-time system performance
Led and mentored an 8-person development team, fostering collaboration and achieving 95% sprint velocity
Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Developed innovative middleware solutions for PTT Akıllı Esnaf platform, successfully onboarding 50K+ merchants
Applied computer science principles to implement PCI-DSS compliant payment processing system

workExperience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
workExperience.description: Led frontend architecture and development for Videotron BSS telecommunications platform, focusing on performance optimization and user experience.
achievements: Developed responsive dashboard reducing customer service response time by 40% for 1M+ subscribers
Implemented NGXS state management improving application stability by 50% and reducing bug reports by 65%
Created reusable component library reducing development time by 40% across 3 enterprise projects
Optimized Angular bundle size achieving 45% reduction in initial load time
Implemented comprehensive testing framework achieving 85% code coverage

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Architected and developed enterprise procurement system for Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality, focusing on security and scalability.
achievements: Designed and implemented REST API handling 10K+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime
Developed secure QR-based authentication system for 1000+ users
Optimized Oracle database queries reducing response time by 30%
Implemented mobile hand terminal integration for inventory management

workExperience.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
workExperience.description: Led development of secure payment processing mobile applications for international banks and financial institutions.
achievements: Developed MPOS application for CSOB bank processing 50K+ daily transactions
Implemented cross-platform payment solution reducing development time by 40%
Created PCI-DSS compliant TapOnPhone and SoftPOS solutions
Developed MyGini loyalty application improving customer engagement by 35%

workExperience.title: Full Stack Engineer
workExperience.description: Developed full-stack solutions for social media platforms and enterprise systems, focusing on scalability and real-time communication.
achievements: Architected and implemented scalable REST APIs serving 100K+ daily active users
Developed real-time chat system supporting 10K+ concurrent users using XMPP/Openfire
Implemented hybrid database architecture reducing query time by 50%
Integrated e-Invoice system processing 5K+ monthly transactions
Developed SSR-enabled Angular application improving SEO metrics by 80%
Implemented video conferencing system using WebRTC and Openfire
Set up high-availability database clusters with master-master replication
Focus on IT Management and Business Process Analysis
Key courses: Database Management, System Analysis, IT Project Management
Applied business analytics and enterprise systems management
